extends Object
    Contains the functions that change the model

    • Method Detail

      • addDisc

        public static Grid addDisc​(Grid grid,
                           int column)
        This function can return the same Grid if no new Disc can be inserted or a new Grid with one more Disc at the appropriate colum
        Parameters:
        grid - Object containing the the game board and the next players id
        column - the column in which the player choose to insert the disc
        Returns:
        either the same board and the same person or a new board and a new person

      • areFourConnected

        public static boolean areFourConnected​(int[][] board,
                                       int player)
        This checks if the player has won either vertically, horizontally, descending diagonally or ascending diagonally
        Parameters:
        board - the board with the discs
        player - the player we are currently checking
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value which can be either true or false if the player wins or loses

      • saveGame

        public static void saveGame​(Grid grid)
        This function saves the board and the current players index in a json file format
        Parameters:
        grid - the Grid that we will save

      • loadGame

        public static Grid loadGame()
        This function loads the game from a JSON file
        Returns:
        the board with the current player index
